name: Arrow Legend
description:
Arrow Hero is incredibly simple game, yet it effectively puts your fingers to a worthy challenge. Test your reaction and agility, and most importantly - have fun!
Your goal is to match your inputs with an unstoppable continuous overwhelming flow of arrows.

Features:
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- Challenging gameplay.
- Minimalistic visual design.
- Easy on battery!
- Leaderboard and challenge friends.
